line.text: What are you up to today ?
Oh, but I'll be there. Believe me.

answer.text: Hey, you treat me like I deserve to.

line.text: I am an emperor, what are you ?

answer.text: I am the king of emperors, what are you ?
Nobody... I come here in total humility.

line.text: Well, you are a fool to have come this way.
